lines.text: Did you hear something back there that sounds like there's something back there?

[after being shot with a ray gun]
I smell cooking, man. Some thing's cooking.
What are you talking about?
Smells like somebody making hamburgers.
Damn Sam. It's you.
It is?
[looks at his wound and dies]
Were you not chained to a major support beam of my ship I wouldn't stand a chance of having sex with someone so alluring as you.
Leave her alone, you half-electric asshole.
He didn't mean that. He respects the brave way you confront your disability.
I rebuilt my mind!
So, you have a homemade brain.

[to Cindy, in bed]
Just close your eyes and think of Brooklyn.
You know, for a son-of-a-bitch, gimp rapist murderer... he died ok!
I'm sorry you couldn't find it in your heart to give me a chance. You could have been my beloved concubine. Shared my position here.
Well, I guess it wasn't in my fortune cookie.
Now, all you'll share is my crew. 312 of them in random order.
John we gotta do something. What do think they're doing to her up there, huh?
It's not the first time, kid, and she's doing it for the team.
I pray you allow me a few moments to coordinate my seldom-used reproductive sequencer.
You're gonna make one a them desperate last stands?
Look, setting aside what this scum have in mind for us, what do you think they're gonna do to her, huh?
Mike, there's not alot we can do. We just hope that our cooperative attitudes and sunny dispositions see us clear.
